#summary namespace and resource discovery registries

= Resource Discovery Registry =
prefix dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

prefix registry: <http://bio2rdf.org/registry:>

prefix foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> 

===Namespace===
{{{
 dcterms:identifier [string]             # given by source + short name [e.g. registry:ns/bind]
 registry:id_specification [regex]          # a regular expression to validate the identifier against
 registry:id_example [string]               # an example identifier [e.g. 123]

 dcterms:replaces [Namespace Record]     # if this supercedes another registry entry [e.g. nar:BIND]
 dcterms:isReplacedBy [Namespace Record] # if this is supercedes by another registry entry
 registry:equivalentTo [Namespace Record]        # is interchangeable with (useful for aggregating namespaces under one namespace e.g. kegg as a namespace for kegg_ligand)

 dcterms:publisher [Publisher Record]    # the publisher of the namespace (e.g. NAR, GO)
 registry:resource [Resource Record]        # the resource to which this namespace applies 
}}}

===Resource===
{{{
 dcterms:identifier [string]             # given by source + short name [e.g. bind]
 dcterms:title [string]             # a brief summary of the resource [e.g. The Biomolecular Interaction Network Database]
 dcterms:description [string]       # a more elaborate description 
 dcterms:subject [url|ns:id|string] # a curated subject heading [e.g. protein interaction]
 foaf:homepage [url]                # the homepage of the resource [e.g. http://bind.ca]
 dcterms:publisher [Publisher Record]    # link to the original/primary publisher
}}}

===Publisher===
{{{ 
 dcterms:identifier [string]        # source + short name [e.g. registry:publisher/bio2rdf]
 foaf:name [string]                 # the publisher's name [e.g. Bio2RDF]
 foaf:mbox [string]                 # the publisher's email address for contact purposes
 foaf:homepage [url]                # the publisher's homepage [e.g. http://bio2rdf.org]
}}}

===Data===
{{{
 dcterms:identifier [uri]             # source + short name [e.g. registry:data/bio2rdf/uniprot/n3] 
 dcterms:subject [Namespace Record]   # link to the *primary* namespace record(s)
 registry:references [Namespace Record]       # link to all/any referenced namespaces
 dcterms:format ["html"|"txt"|"tab"|"n3"|"xml"|"rdfxml"|"virtuosodb"|"wsdl"|"sparql"] # the type of data source 
 registry:location [url[?ns][?id]]            # the URL containing the resource, with optional regex for spiking in the namespace (?ns) or identifier (?id)
 
 registry:availability ["free"|"free for academic"|"commercial"|"not available"|"see license"] # 
 dcterms:license [url]                # a document that provides usage rights
 dcterms:source [uri]                 # the original source of this data

 registry:status ["primary"|"secondary"|"ternary"] # primary is the original data provider's data, in whatever format. secondary is an exact mirror copy. ternary is a derivative work.
 dcterms:publisher [Publisher Record] # the publisher of this resource
 registry:statistics [Statistics Record]      # statistics associated with the resource
}}}

==Statistics==
{{{
 dcterms:identifier [uri]           # source + short name [e.g. registry:statistics/bio2rdf/uniprot/n3]
 registry:records [integer]                 # number of entries in the core namespace
 registry:topics [integer]                  # number of unique entities
 registry:triples [integer]                 # number of unique statements
 registry:size [integer]                    # of bytes the file contains
}}}
